mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_list ( user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, base_address, detail_address, used_points, payment_method ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{baseAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{usedPoints}, #{paymentMethod} )

INSERT INTO order_item ( order_id, product_id, name, image, color, size, quantity, unit_price, coupon_id ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{name}, #{image}, #{color}, #{size}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{couponId} )
mapper.select: SELECT o.user_id, o.receiver_name, o.receiver_phone, o.base_address, o.detail_address, o.used_points, o.payment_method, i.product_id, i.name, i.image, i.color, i.size, i.quantity, i.unit_price, i.coupon_id FROM order_list o JOIN order_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.order_id DESC
